sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'
import { Form, Box, Button, Block, Notification } from 'react-bulma-components';
import FiltersLibrary from './FiltersLibrary'

// pobieranie slownika gatunkow

function Filters({ albums, setRealFromChild }) {
    const { Input, Field, Control, Label, Select, Help } = Form
    const [filters, setFilters] = useState({
        artist: '',
        title: '',
        genres: '',
        band_name: '',
        label_origin: ''
    })

    useEffect(() => {
        var f = new FiltersLibrary(albums, filters)
        var match = f.manage()

        function removeDuplicates(arr) {
            return arr.filter((item, 
                index) => arr.indexOf(item) === index);
        }

        setRealFromChild(removeDuplicates(match))
    }, [filters])

    const handleInput = (e) => {
        const keyName = e.target.name
        const keyVal = e.target.value
        setFilters(prev => ({...prev, [keyName]: keyVal}))
      }

  return (
    <Box>
        {/* Search by key - artist */}
        <Field>
            <Label>Artist name</Label>
            <Control>
                <Input 
                    type='text'
                    name='artist'
                    value={filters.artist}
                    onChange={handleInput}
                    placeholder='Search artist name'/>
            </Control>
            <Help>It is common on Bandcamp for label to put their name as artist name.</Help>
        </Field>

        {/* Search by key - album title */}
        <Field>
            <Label>Title</Label>
            <Control>
                <Input 
                    type='text'
                    name='title'
                    value={filters.title}
                    onChange={handleInput}
                    placeholder='Search album title'/>
            </Control>
        </Field>

        {/* Search by key - genres */}
        <Field horizontal>
            <Field.Label>
                <Label>Genres</Label>
            </Field.Label>
            <Field.Body>
                <Field>
                    <Control>
                        <Input 
                            type='text'
                            name='genres'
                            value={filters.genres}
                            onChange={handleInput}
                            placeholder='Search genres'/>
                    </Control>
                </Field>
            </Field.Body>
        </Field>

        {/* Search by key - label */}
        <Field horizontal>
            <Field.Label>
                <Label>Label name</Label>
            </Field.Label>
            <Field.Body>
                <Field>
                    <Control>
                        <Input 
                            type='text'
                            name='band_name'
                            value={filters.band_name}
                            onChange={handleInput}
                            placeholder='Search label'/>
                    </Control>
                </Field>
            </Field.Body>
        </Field>

        {/* Search by key - label origin */}
        <Field horizontal>
            <Field.Label>
                <Label>Label origin</Label>
            </Field.Label>
            <Field.Body>
                <Field>
                    <Control>
                        <Input 
                            type='text'
                            name='label_origin'
                            value={filters.label_origin}
                            onChange={handleInput}
                            placeholder='Search in label origin'/>
                    </Control>
                </Field>
            </Field.Body>
        </Field>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default Filters
